261.title: Relating To Insurance.
261.description: Short form bill relating to insurance.

1534.title: Requesting The Department Of Human Services; Department Of Health, Via The Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System; And Department Of Education, Via The Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System, To Collect Information On The Sex, Sexual Orientation, And Gender Identity And Gender Expression Of Respondents, Including Respondents Who Are Under The Supervision Of The Courts And The Hawaii Youth Correctional Facility.
1534.description: Requesting The Department Of Human Services; Department Of Health, Via The Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System; And Department Of Education, Via The Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System, To Collect Information On The Sex, Sexual Orientation, And Gender Identity And Gender Expression Of Respondents, Including Respondents Who Are Under The Supervision Of The Courts And The Hawaii Youth Correctional Facility.

1725.title: Urging The Department Of Public Safety And The Department Of Human Services To Work With The Department Of Health, Department Of Education, And Judiciary To Submit A Plan To Account For Gender Identity With Respect To Incarcerated And Court-involved Youth And Work With The Sexual And Gender Minority Workgroup Within The Department Of Health To Address The Incidence Of Lgbtqi Youth In The Juvenile And Criminal Justice Systems.
1725.description: Urging The Department Of Public Safety And The Department Of Human Services To Work With The Department Of Health, Department Of Education, And Judiciary To Submit A Plan To Account For Gender Identity With Respect To Incarcerated And Court-involved Youth And Work With The Sexual And Gender Minority Workgroup Within The Department Of Health To Address The Incidence Of Lgbtqi Youth In The Juvenile And Criminal Justice Systems.

2506.title: Relating To Blood Donations.
2506.description: Prohibits blood banks operating in the State from rejecting or deferring blood donors on the basis of sexual orientation, actual gender identity, or perceived gender identity.
